## rules namespace

## Variables

| Variable                            | Description                                                                          |
| ----------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [css](/api/bud-build/rules/css)     | Returns [Rule](//bud-build/rule) for <code>.css</code> handling                      |

| [js](/api/bud-build/rules/js)       | Returns [Rule](//bud-build/rule) for <code>.js</code> handling                       |
| [json5](/api/bud-build/rules/json5) | Returns [Rule](//bud-build/rule) for <code>.jsonc</code> handling                    |
| [svg](/api/bud-build/rules/svg)     | Returns [Rule](//bud-build/rule) for <code>.svg</code> handling                      |
| [toml](/api/bud-build/rules/toml)   | Returns [Rule](//bud-build/rule) for <code>.toml</code> handling                     |
